Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: A lightweight Excel export utility for MudBlazor DataGrid in .NET, enabling simple and efficient spreadsheet generation directly from grid data. Built with OpenXML and JavaScript interop for seamless browser-based file downloads.

items.content_html: The argv-utils package is a lightweight library for Node.js that simplifies working with command-line arguments passed to your scripts. It streamlines the process of accessing and managing arguments from process.argv property.
items.title: jesusgraterol/argv-utils: The argv-utils package is a lightweight library for Node.js that simplifies working with command-line arguments passed to your scripts. It streamlines the process of accessing and managing arguments from process.argv property.

items.title: lazbord/PwdVault: Lightweight Chrome extension that helps you securely store, manage, and auto-fill passwords directly in your browser

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
